mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltDtaMngInfoMapper.deleteFcltDtaMngInfo */ TB_TE_APC_SMART_PRPLSN_STTN ASPS SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND ASPS.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr} AND ASPS.APC_CD = #{apcCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltDtaMngInfoMapper.selectFcltDtaMngInfoRawDataList */ ASPS.CRTR_YR , ASPS.APC_CD
, (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV',CTPV_CD) FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS CTPV_NM
, (SELECT X.CD_VL_EXPLN FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL X WHERE 1=1 AND X.CD_ID = 'UNTY_SGG' AND X.APC_CD = '0000' AND X.CD_VL = (SELECT SIGUN_CD FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR) ) AS SIGUN_NM
, (SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS APC_NM
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.PRDCTN_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS PRDCTN_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'PRDCTN' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS PRDCTN_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'PRDCTN' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS PRDCTN_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.WRHS_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS WRHS_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'WRHS' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS WRHS_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'WRHS' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS WRHS_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.SORT_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS SORT_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'SORT' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS SORT_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'SORT' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS SORT_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.STRG_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS STRG_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'STRG' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS STRG_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'STRG' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS STRG_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.PCKG_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS PCKG_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'PCKG' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS PCKG_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'PCKG' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS PCKG_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.JOB_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS JOB_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'JOB' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS JOB_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'JOB' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS JOB_DTL_ETC
, FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('MNG_MTHD', ASPS.SPMT_INFO_MNG_MTHD) AS SPMT_INFO_MNG_MTHD , (SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL',ASDM.DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATA_MNG_TYPE_DTL) FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'SPMT' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR ) AS SPMT_DTL , NVL((SELECT DATA_MNG_ETC FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_DATA_MNG ASDM WHERE 1=1 AND DATA_MNG_TYPE = 'SPMT' AND DATA_MNG_YN = 'Y' AND APC_CD = ASPS.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = ASPS.CRTR_YR AND DATA_MNG_ETC IS NOT NULL),'' ) AS SPMT_DTL_ETC
FROM TB_TE_APC_SMART_PRPLSN_STTN ASPS WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN != 'Y' AND APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND ASPS.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND ASPS.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY ASPS.CRTR_YR , APC_NM
